short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for getting text from html table

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that helps to take text from HTML tables in a convenient csv-like format.
How to use:
1. Right click on the HTML table
2. Select the item in the context menu "Get text".
3. Done - the data is stored in your clipboard (press CTRL+C to paste it).

Extension options:
1. delimeter: which character to use to separate table columns (default is ";")
2. replace on: replaces the text in "replace" with the text in "on" when saved to the clipboard.
3. replace line break on: what to replace line breaks in the table (within one cell).
